topic.title: How can the Computer Lab Improve High School Teaching
How to Use the Document Scanner

shortdesc.p: The document scanner can be used to display paper documents on the projector for everyone in the classroom to see. This is very helpful when you need to show the entire group something that is in paper format.

topic.title: Where to go Incase of an Emergency

shortdesc.p: In the event that there is an emergency in the building and you are required to leave the building you will need to find the nearest exit and get at least 30 feet away from the building.
